snippet: A late quarterback switch paid off for South Carolina in the Outback Bowl, and senior fullback Lonnie Pryor led Florida State to a 21-point victory in the Orange Bowl.
abstract: College Football Roundup; South Carolina beats Michigan, 33-28 in the Outback Bowl; Florida State defeats Northern Illinois, 31-10 in the Orange Bowl; other bowl scores noted.
lead_paragraph: A late quarterback switch paid off for South Carolina in the Outback Bowl, and senior fullback Lonnie Pryor led Florida State to a 21-point victory in the Orange Bowl.

headline.seo: Late Quarterback Switch Pays Off for South Carolina
headline.main: South Carolina Wins in Last Minute; Florida State Takes Orange Bowl
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Wins in Last Minute; Florida State Takes Orange Bowl
